caption.title: Representative 3-D reconstruction of the right femur from the embryonic period to the early fetal period.
caption.p: (A) Gross view, (B) proximal epiphysis (posterior view), (C) distal epiphysis. Numbers represent the crownâ€“rump length (mm). Ossified region is indicated as purple. ff: femoral head fovea; fh: femoral head; lt: lesser trochanter; tf: trochanteric fossa. See also S7, S8 and S9 Movies.
